summary:
After many hours of gameplay, I just figured out that Windhelm, a city with harbour, is missing of a lighthouse!
Well... I've just added it and it's located in North-East of Windhelm (map marker available).
A caretaker NPC with his house inside the lighthouse. He lit up the fire at 7pm of every day.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]

[size=7][color=cyan]WINDHELM LIGHTHOUSE[/color][/size][/center]

* OVERVIEW *
After many hours of gameplay, I just figured out that Windhelm, a city with harbour, is missing of a lighthouse!
Well... I've just added it and it's located in North-East of Windhelm (map marker available).
A caretaker NPC with his house inside the lighthouse. He lit up the fire at 7pm of every day.

* INSTALL *
Just drop the BSA and ESP in data folder and activate them.

* UNINSTALL *
- Go inside an interior cell
- Wait for at least 12 hours
- Save
- Remove ESP and BSA
- Reload
- Save

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find bugs.

* FACEBOOK *
I'm on Facebook: [url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods[/url]

Join me!
author: MannyGT

files.name: Windhelm Lighthouse
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a tiny LOD issue at east of the lighthouse.
